rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed with a north-facing approach to welcome positive energy and align with Vastu principles.
A modern open-plan area combining living space and kitchen designed in Chettinad style with ample natural light and connectivity to the garden.
The master bedroom is positioned for optimal relaxation and privacy with views of the garden.
An attached bathroom to ensure convenience and a seamless flow from the bedroom area.

openings.description: Large windows to enhance natural lighting and ventilation.
Provides access to the garden for relaxation and fresh air.

external_features.description: Large garden space with native landscaping that respects local flora and Vastu principles of greenery placement for enhanced energy flow.
A small water feature near the garden entrance to promote positive vibrations as per Vastu guidelines.

levels.additional_notes: The design incorporates traditional Chettinad aesthetics with modern open-plan living while adhering to local building norms and Vastu principles, particularly focusing on a north-facing entrance and optimal room orientations for energy balance. The penthouse is designed to be functional as a bachelor pad ensuring comfort and spaciousness.
